value.description:
Nightmare Moon was once Equestria's greatest threat, feared by many and respected by few.

Out here on the rimworlds, however, she's perfectly happy to accept offers of chocolate - and sometimes other stuff - in exchange for powerful items that will benefit your colony.

ITEMS YOU CAN ASK FOR

- Persona core (requires ship computer core)
- Healer mech serum (requires healing factors)
- Resurrector mech serum (requires healing factors)
- Techprof subpersona core
- Elephant tusk
- Thrumbo horn
- Luciferium x 5 (requires drug production)
- Glitterworld medicine x 5 (requires medicine production)

ITEMS YOU CAN RETURN

- Persona core
- Healer mech serum
- Resurrector mech serum
- Techprof subpersona core
- Elephant tusk
- Thrumbo horn

Returning an item gives you 20% of its value in chocolate.
